content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for considering my apartment. I believe we can agree on a fair rental price that benefits both of us. May I ask, what is your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
300 Euro per month
Hello Mister Heine, thank you for considering my apartment. I believe we can agree on a fair rental price that benefits both of us. May I ask, what is your budget for renting this apartment?
My budget is 300 Euro per month.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your response, Baihu Li. While I understand that your budget is 300 Euro per month, I believe we can negotiate a higher rental price that reflects the value and location of the apartment. May I suggest a rental price of 400 Euro per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
350 Euro per month
Hello Mister Heine, thank you for considering my apartment. I believe we can agree on a fair rental price that benefits both of us. May I ask, what is your budget for renting this apartment?
My budget is 300 Euro per month.
I agree to the price of 350 Euro per month.
TERMINATE.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your response, Baihu Li. While I appreciate your offer of 350 Euro per month, I believe we can still negotiate a higher rental price that reflects the value and location of the apartment. May I suggest a rental price of 500 Euro per month?
name: Heinrich Heine
